name: @miqro/web-components
description: helpers for creating dynamic HTMLElements with a basic template system

scripts.postbuild: deno bundle dist/esm/index.js dist/esm.bundle.js && cp dist/esm.bundle.js dist/esm.bundle.mjs
scripts.build:examples: npm run build && mkdir examples/sfc/dist; npx miqro sfc -m "../esm.bundle.js" ./examples/sfc/src ./examples/sfc/dist && npx miqro generate:template:cache examples/sfc/dist examples/sfc/cache.json
scripts.postbuild:examples: cd examples/sfc && webpack -c webpack.config.cjs && rm -Rf examples/sfc/dist;

author: claukers
